subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With Jeremy Lin not expected to play Wednesday, and Baron Davis’s knee requiring surgery that will keep him out a year, the veteran Mike Bibby will start at point guard for the Knicks.
snippet: With Jeremy Lin not expected to play Wednesday, and Baron Davis’s knee requiring surgery that will keep him out a year, the veteran Mike Bibby will start at point guard for the Knicks.
